entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve workloads versioning #22151
    6.0.2xx
  • Make separate previews/RCs separate bands for workloads #22150
    7.0.1xx
  • Determine improvements to our codeflow, arcade, and signing process #22149
    6.0.2xx
  • Add additional details on the workload version in dotnet workload --list #22148
    6.0.2xx
  • Properties provided to dotnet run are also tunneled through to the application regardless of double dash (--) with .NET 5 #22133
  • Restore log message "所有项目均是最新的，无法还原" should change to "所有项目均是最新的，无需还原" #22131
  • After .NET 6.0 RTM arm64 SDK installed, "dotnet run" failed with error "A fatal error occurred..." when open 3.1/5.0 project. #22127
  • The previous project cannot be run after upgrading to from .NET 6.0 RC2 arm64 to RTM arm64. #22125
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies produces broken deps.json file if PrivateAssets is set to compile #22124
  • Manually change Framework in runtimeconfig.json? #22128
  • repeat sdks, runtimes list #22118

Closed

  • Upgraded to .net 6 Preview 7 and workload commands are failing #19670
  • Running `dotnet test` on a project that uses optional workloads can't find them #21845
  • dotnet format does not work in WPF projects in .NET 6 RC 2 #22068

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable rollback support for manifest MSIs #22159
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx][blazorwasm] Fix publishing project with lazy loaded assembly #22145
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ConcatenateCssFiles when used with Razor class libraries #21982
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22035
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add a target and tests for re-generating scoped css files as part of hot reload #22103
    Area-AspNetCore
